sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-container style="min-height: 100vh; ">
    <!--侧边栏设置-->
    <el-aside width="sideWidth + 'px'" style="background-color: rgb(238, 241, 246); height: 100%; overflow: hidden;
               box-shadow: 2px 0 6px rgb(0 21 41 / 35%);">
      <!--菜单栏-->
      <Aside :isCollapse="isCollapse" :logoTextShow="logoTextShow"></Aside>
    </el-aside>

    <el-container>
      <!--头部-->
      <el-header style="border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;">
        <Header :collapseBtnClass="collapseBtnClass" :collapse="isCollapse"></Header>
      </el-header>
      <!--主体-->
      <el-main>
<!--        表示当前页面的子路由会在router-view里面展示-->
        <router-view></router-view>
      </el-main>

    </el-container>

  </el-container>
</template>



<!--用JS写的用来完善HTML的属性方法等等-->
<script>
import request from "@/utils/request"
import Aside from "@/components/Aside.vue";
import Header from "@/components/Header.vue";
export default {
  name: 'HomeView',
  data()
  {
    return{
      msg: "hello jjm",
      collapseBtnClass: 'el-icon-s-fold',
      isCollapse:false,
      sideWidth: 200,
      logoTextShow: true
    }
  },

  // 这是初始函数，自动执行
  created()
  {
    this.load()
  },

  components: {
    Aside,
    Header
  },
  methods:{
  }
}

</script>
